message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DL. 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning and planning, which are core topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of policy gradient theorems and the proposed architecture for learning options suggest a focus on deep learning and robotics. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.DL (Deep Learning).
